channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two street lights out on Bethesda Street, 18th December
item.description:
For months I’ve been having to walk down this street in the dark as no street lamps are working. I do not feel safe. Please have these relit as soon as possible as it can be a busy thoroughfare.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethesda Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste bin overflowing with dog waste, 17th December
item.description:
Daisy Bank Road car pork opposite bridge and at entrance to the incline has a waste bin overflowing with dog waste. Needs emptying and perhaps a separate dog waste bin provided?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daisybank Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water doesn't drain, 17th December
item.description:
Drain outside 223 Brooklyn Road is blocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 221, Brooklyn Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping at bmx site, 17th December
item.description:
Waste and fly tipping at degraded Cheltenham BMX site. Strewn with plastics, glass bottles, 1000L water storage containers, BBQ, destroyed site signage, drinks cans. Been in this condition for many months, is an eyesore to an AOONB and a danger to wildlife and public.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Standard Gauge Incline, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree on Nuthill soon turning from Painswick Road, 17th December
item.description:
Driving back from Cheltenham this evening, a vehicle had stopped on Nuthill as couldn't proceed because of a fallen tree. Both they, and we, had to a u-turn.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nuthill, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 17th December
item.description:
Pothole In the road Wider than 30cm & deeper than 4cm
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole next to bench, 17th December
item.description:
As you come into coriander drive just as you come over the first speed bump located next to the bench on the left there is a large pot hole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coriander Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many potholes!, 17th December
item.description:
There are a large number of potholes between the farm and the end of the lane. There seems to be an issue with drainage near the farm and at this point half the lane is covered in water. There also seems to be a sizeable pothole under the water that can’t be seen by eye, and so hard to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are a large collection of signs and barriers that we used when the council marked out the Z15 parking zones. The yhave not moved since mid September save when drunk people block to the road with them. This happened last night at North hall mews and some have been carried further down the road to the top of All Saints Road. I have not retrieved these as they are 100 meters away. Is there any chance they could be collected?, 17th December
item.description:
At the junction of North Hall Mews (GL52 2QD) and Pittville Circus Road. There are some barriers at the junction of All Saints Road and Pittville Circus Road now as well. These are nothing to do with the Water Works which are currently ongoing on the opposite side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Hall Mews, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Blocked gully overflowing down the road, 17th December
item.description:
Gulley outside West Ridge is blocked Water pouring across and down the road up to an inch deep. If the temps were to drop and freeze the road would be impassible and extremely dangerous, the Cottage on the bend would be at risk of being hit

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Utility Company Work/Repair Sinking, 16th December
item.description:
Earlier this year some entity dug up the road across Albert Road. They repaired the road but clearly very poorly. There is now a deep drop where the replaced tarmac has dropped. The company need to be held to account and repair the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Crescent Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on north road west, 16th December
item.description:
North Road west coming away from Cheltenham towards Badgeworth
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, North Road West, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights are not working, 16th December
item.description:
Bibury Road, Cheltenham (gl51 6az)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Bibury Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole westbound on the Old Gloucester Road just before the building works.. Both my offside wheels wend down it with a loud bang. I need to get the car checked for damage. There is no way you can see this in the dark., 16th December
item.description:
This could easily break suspension or have a motorcyclist off their bike!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car park in a deplorable state, 16th December
item.description:
It's frustrating that places like this get so badly abused. Would it be possible for there to be a good clean up soon, repeated every few years?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buckholt Road, Cranham, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation needs removing to get original width of the path, 16th December
item.description:
See photos. Travelling into Cheltenham. Only one path is available. Recent works from the corner house at the end of Chargrove Lane with the A46 Shurdington Road. Workmen at this house took a shovel to the decayed vegetation on the path. It was removed in minutes. Now it's up to you to continue please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Only street lamp in carpark is permanently out, 16th December
item.description:
Only street lamp in Zura Avenue/Beamont Walk carpark is permanently out and has been for many months. This is dangerous at nighttime
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Zura Avenue, Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant amount of water pouring down Bushcombe Lane from a problem further uptake hill., 16th December
item.description:
This issue has been reported before by another member of the public. The flow has in creased dramatically and now is right across the road. If there is a drop in temperature the road will become treacherous and where the water crosses is on a bend. There is a serious chance of an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Fence post blocking footpath, 16th December
item.description:
The field north of Coberley Court has problems on both boundaries where the public footpath has been blocked, or narrowed to an extent that makes access difficult.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Street, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Few pot holes on the road, 16th December
item.description:
The whole (hales close) road is quite cracked and potholed it looks like it needs to be redone!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Hales Close, Battledown, Cheltenham
